description.value:
You clang your ikon against a weapon, shield, or the ground, emitting a shock wave that deals @Damage[(max(1,(floor((@actor.level - 2)/2))))d4[spirit],(max(1,(floor((@actor.level - 2)/2))))d4[sonic]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] or @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] (@Check[fortitude|against:exemplar|basic|options:area-effect] save). A creature that critically fails its saving throw is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 minute.

At 6th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4 spirit damage and 1d4 sonic damage.
